content: I'm excited to try Los Tacos No. 1 and experience the flavors of Mexico in NYC. I'll definitely take your recommendations into consideration and try to get there early to avoid the crowds. Since I'm based in San Francisco, I'm used to a diverse food scene, and I'm looking forward to trying something new in NYC. Speaking of diversity, I've been thinking about exploring some of the different neighborhoods in NYC, like Chinatown or Koreatown. Do you have any recommendations for must-visit spots in these areas?
